course.highlight: Used Wireshark to capture packets and observe network packets
Learned about circuits, logic math, Python, and recursion.
Developed a database to track students and employees in a University using Visio and MySQL.
Gained understanding in Basic Signals, Systems, Analog, and Digital Communications.
Used Microsoft Project to create a plan for project. As the PM of team, led team on research and presentation of Singapore Tradenet Case Study.

course.description: Object Oriented Techniques for IT Problem Solving
course.highlight: Used Java programming language to design solutions for business problems including, constructing, testing, and implementing Object Oriented analysis and design.
Gained understanding in advanced Web design principles and technologies. Created web pages with emergeing technologies such as, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, DOM, XML, and AJAX.
